vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.19;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_7.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Token.withdrawToken (patch_7.sol#29-32):
	-require(bool)(_token.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),_to,_amount)) patch_7.sol#31

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in TokenBank.withdrawToHolder (patch_7.sol#62-67):
	-require(bool)(_addr.call.value(_wei)()) patch_7.sol#65
